few_shots.introduction: Here are some status examples of CapCut window screenshots.
This is a correct example: A new CapCut project is created.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, a new CapCut project is created.

few_shots.introduction: This is a correct example: Click at the media.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it clicks at the media. Note that the mouse is clicking on the media, and there is a white border around the media.

few_shots.introduction: This is a wrong example: Click at the media.
few_shots.assistant: No, it doesn't click at the media. Note that the mouse is not clicking on the media, and there is no white border around the media.

image_introduction.introduction: Here are some previous screenshots to help in decision making.

This screenshot is the previous step in the application.
